news.title: As Binance works toward redemption, CEO says Trump has been ‘fantastic’ for crypto
news.summary: Binance, the once embattled cryptocurrency exchange, is now navigating a dramatically friendlier political landscape under President Donald Trump. Binance was once one of the most controversial exchanges in the world.

news.title: 5 years into the remote work boom, the return-to-office push is stronger than ever—here's why
news.summary: Even companies that initially championed the model are changing their tune. The pandemic ushered in a new way of working remotely, but even companies that originally championed it are changing its tune.

news.title: Why Trump's economic policies may have canceled the DOGE dividend check, at least for now
news.summary: The market is wobbling and inflation will be back if Trump follows through on tariffs threats on April 2. Would a DOGE dividend check hurt or help the economy?

news.title: 29-year-old couldn't afford a house in the U.S., so she bought one sight unseen in Italy: 'I plan to use it like a retirement plan'
news.summary: Lauren Scott started looking to buy overseas in 2021. She closed on a house in Tuscany, Italy in 2022. Lauren Scott is a freelance writer based in London.

news.title: Why it suddenly feels like every fast-food restaurant has fun, flavored drinks
news.summary: Wendy's, Taco Bell and Chick-fil-A are among the restaurant chains that are looking beyond fountain soda for their drink offerings.
